name: Micro Arcade
description:
You're playing the really easy game T.A.N.K. at your local video arcade. However, you have been shrunken to the size of a joystick, which might be making things harder.

Micro Arcade has been made for the Video Games Lab Game Jam 2021. Try to complete this game in a game as a half-foot-high gamer. Avoid the mines, drive safely, and don't fall off the arcade game you're standing on.

(Use the Windows version for better performance)

Move the mouse to look around

Use ZQSD, WASD, or the arrow keys to move
